front.div:
Abstract
The
19 F(
7 Li,
7
Be)
19 O charge-exchange reaction at 52 MeV incident energy has been
performed at INFN-LNS in Catania using the MAGNEX spectrometer. The use of
an algebraic ray-reconstruction technique has allowed to extract the
19 O excitation
energy spectrum and the experimental angular distributions obtained with a single
angular setting of the spectrometer.
